title: ADC's are the cancer of Bronze ELO
body:
Dear Bronze ADCs,


Please do not ask for ADC if you can't build to save your life the was majority of you ({{champion:110}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:429}} ) in paticuar have ZERO knowledge on items to build and as a result this is causing lost games for me.

Your first item you get it is {{item:3031}}  NOT {{item:3087}}  the exceptions to this are {{champion:67}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:119}} .


Please DO NOT  get {{item:3085}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:429}}  players 
Please DO NOT get **both** {{item:3046}}  AND {{item:3087}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:18}} players 
Your third major item is {{item:3035}} 
Your typical adc build  in order (with some exceptions) {{item:3031}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3153}} 


Also here are somethings you need to do.

1. Buy a trinket {{item:3362}} 
2. Buy wards ( especially {{item:2043}}  if there is {{champion:17}} ) this is to save YOUR LIFE.
3. Not dive in team fights
4. Refrain from challenging enemy assassins ({{champion:84}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:238}} ) to duels.
5. Learn to last hit properly ( I do not want to see my ADC with 50 cs at 15 mins) looking at you {{champion:81}} 

The majority of losses have been due to ADCs who deal no damage due to bad builds.
